title: oc6 - files app - longer folder names are not shortened when editing a text file
body:
## expected behavior

if the directory path to a text file which should be edited is very long, the displayed path should be shortened as usual to prevent header line glitches.
![20131213-1_oc6_text_file_in_long_folder_path_with_shortened_path](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/2572764/1742935/ccbe0694-6404-11e3-977f-0957e00d603f.png)

## actual behavior

if the directory path to a text file which should be edited is very long, the displayed path is not shortened which causes header line glitches.

## steps to reproduce

1.) click on the `new` button in long folder path to create a new text file, e.g. 20131213_text.txt
2.) right after the file name has been entered the new file is opened to enter text and the search box is displayed at the beginning of the line where the new text is being displayed. the search box overlays the entered text.
     ![20131213-2_oc6_create_text_file_in_long_folder_path](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/2572764/1742899/f82e0190-6403-11e3-87cb-72ac0dcae80e.png)

3.) if you press the `save` button, the search box is moved to the right side of the screen under the header line.
    ![20131213-3_oc6_create_text_file_in_long_folder_path_and_entered_text](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/2572764/1742915/621633c0-6404-11e3-8ffc-3884154073d8.png)

4.) as soon as you press enter to enter the second line of the text the search box is moved to the beginning of the line again.

## environment:

#### server configuration

os: linux 2.6.24-24
web server: apache2 2.4.6
database: mysql 5.1.72
php version: 5.4.21
owncloud version: 6.0


#### client configuration

browser: firefox 26.0
operating system: windows 7
